feed.title: Homarr iFrames Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v1.0.0 - Alarms iFrame Added
entry.content:
Alarms iFrame Added

This iframe shows alarms (warnings, errors, failed jobs notifications, etc) from multiple services (netdata, arr services, pihole, kavita, kaizoku, speedtest tracker) in one central place.

Netdata iframe removed

Now the netdata iframe alarms are in the new alarms iframe.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v0.1.19...v1.0.0

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v1.1.0 - New Media Requests iFrame
entry.content:
Media Requests iFrame Added

This iFrame shows media requests from your Overseerr and Jellyseerr instances.

Changed (breaking change)

Renamed OVERSEERR_TOKEN environment variable to OVERSEERR_API_KEY.

Removed (breaking change)

Removed the Overseerr iframe, it's now part of the media requests iframe.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v1.0.2...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v1.2.0 - Set custom background images
entry.content:
Added

  • Using the new VIKUNJA_BACKGROUND_IMG_URL and LINKWARDEN_BACKGROUND_IMG_URL environment variables, it's now possible to set custom background images for the tasks/bookmarks cards of the Vikunja and Linkwarden iframes.
  • The background_position, background_size, and background_filter query arguments added to the Vikunja and Linkwarden iframes can change the custom background images' CSS properties.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v1.1.1...v1.2.0

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v1.4.0 - Speedtest tracker alarm
entry.content:
Breaking Changes

Start using the speedtest tracker v1 API (as the previous API is deprecated). Because of this, the speedtest tracker alarm now needs an API token to work. You can get it in your speedtest tracker dashboard and provide using the environment variable SPEEDTEST_TRACKER_TOKEN.

Added

The alarms iframe now shows if the latest speedtest tracker test threshold breached in addition to showing if an error occurred in the latest test:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v1.5.0 - Add ChangeDetection.io to Alarms iFrame
entry.content:
ChangeDetection.io

Shows cards for your watches' errors and changes from your ChangeDetection.io instance. - Check the docs for more info.

Docker Image

  1. Reduce docker image size from 1.3GB to 43MB.
  2. Add health check.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v1.4.0...v1.5.0
